DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces "," Ex: 254759000340,254756360306

HEROKU_API.description: Put a Heroku API key here, will be required to update vars in your DM

BAD_WORD.description: List words separated with commas that will be considered bad. Example: fuck, pussy, hoe

CODE.description: Country code without +, used for antiforeign feature (e.g., 254)

SESSION.description: Paste your Session ID after pairing the bot (required for authentication)

APP_NAME.description: repeat the appname you filled above, lowercase

MENU_LINK.description: Image URL for menu (if MENU_TYPE is IMAGE)

MENU_TYPE.description: VIDEO, LINK, or IMAGE menu format

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string, it will be automatically added by Heroku Postgres add-on, leave it blank
